title: Filibuster Fight: The Senate rule that keeps changing over time
description: Carrie Dann looks at how the filibuster has evolved, from an unwritten rule to a blocking tactic that has been used at historically high rates.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
content:encoded: Carrie Dann looks at how the filibuster has evolved, from an unwritten rule to a blocking tactic that has been used at historically high rates.
